activities: The information received from the EU is used for purposes of managing our workforce, handling customer service, product order and account management activities, marketing our products and services, and otherwise maintaining our customer relationships and advancing our business.
corpofftitle1: Senior Vice President – General Counsel & Corporate Secretary
recoursemech: In the event we cannot resolve a complaint internally, the complainant may submit the matter to binding arbitration administered by the American Arbitration Association (ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program); for human resources information we will use the EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs)
